2007740.name: The Roots
2007740.description:
About this game:
"Townique is a town where those who have survived the disaster take refuge. Together with the character Gowi, you can explore this town, engage in farming, strengthen your character, and discover mysterious cities. The most significant difference that this game will offer is that you get to choose the upcoming innovations. If you communicate the innovations you desire through our community, you will be able to see them in the game shortly!

Game Contents
Farming: Through your agricultural activities, you can feed the people of Townique and generate income.
Combat: You can engage in battles with enemies encountered in dungeons and various locations
